title: The Ruby and the Caldron
creator: Anna Katharine Green
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of The Ruby and the Caldron, by Anna Katharine Green. Read by Carolin. A valuable ruby is lost during a disturbance in the snow before a ball at The Evergreens. A detective is called for right away to recover it, but who, of the few guests, might have the jewel, and how to solve the mystery without causing a scandal? (Summary by Carolin) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; ruby; mystery; short story

reviews.reviewbody: Summary covers the plot, and the story naturally has a happy ending.  Carolin does an excellent job with the reading.  Enjoy!

This was a sweet little short story, the plot of which is adequately summed up in the story blurb. It's so short there's not a lot of characterization work, but solving the mystery is an up-and-down journey. Also, Carolin did an excellent job narrating!
reviews.reviewtitle: Nice little short story with an unexpected conclusion
